instruction.en:
Toggle the pair button or an attached wall switch 3 times quickly.

If pairing does not automatically start, try toggle the pair button or attached wall switch 3 times quickly, then hold it down until the LED blinks red rapidly (it takes more than 20 seconds) and then try pairing the device again.

hint.en: This setting determines the time in seconds it takes to dim from one level to another. Note: this setting can be overriden by the duration value in a Flow Card.
Dim level will be retained on OnOff.
